Class BlueDeviceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.tomek_krzyszko.bluemanager.device.BlueDeviceController

  • public class BlueDeviceController
extends Object
    Class which describe and control whole connection process with Bluetooth devices

      • connectDevice

        public void connectDevice(BlueDevice blueDevice,
                          BlueDeviceConnectionListener blueDeviceConnectionListener)
        Method that is responsible for connecting to the Bluetooth Device
        Parameters:
        blueDevice - BlueDevice to which we want to connect
        blueDeviceConnectionListener - BlueDeviceConnectionListener as a callback method to return information about connection process

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect(BlueDevice blueDevice)
        Method that is responsible for disconnecting from the Bluetooth Device
        Parameters:
        blueDevice - BlueDevice with which we want to disconnect

      • performAction

        public boolean performAction(BlueDevice blueDevice,
                             BlueAction blueAction,
                             BlueDeviceActionListener blueDeviceActionListener)
        Method which perform proper action on the Bluetooth device
        Parameters:
        blueDevice - BlueDevice on which the BlueAction will be performed
        blueAction - BlueAction that will be performed
        blueDeviceActionListener - BlueDeviceActionListener as a callback method to return information about the action
        Returns:
        true if method successfully starts proper bluetooth process, false if device or action are wrong

        blueDeviceActionListener - BlueDeviceActionListener as a callback method to return information about the action

      • refreshDeviceCache

        public boolean refreshDeviceCache(BluetoothGatt gatt)
        Method that cleans the internal database of scanned BluetoothGattService
        Parameters:
        gatt - BluetoothGatt of which we want to refresh internal cache
        Returns:
        true if method successfully cleans or false when it failed
